description: rust-red long panel with 14 woven bands; widest bands have diamond and zigzag motifs in white, blue, rust, green and yellow; shorter twisted multicolored fringe; short panel has cream-colored ground and large radiating diamond design woven in rust, flanked by geometricized zoomorphic bands woven in black; longer braided multicolored fringe on cream ground end; some hot pink woven details at each end
title: Shoulder cloth
